name: Crittervania
description:
Crittervania [Post MVM8 Jam] Help Shoelace the Mouse conquer the lands of Whale Wreckage, Snake Sewers, Cardboard Keep, and Birdseye Bluffs, and find Awesome powerups along the way. Defeat the Three bosses of the kingdoms in this 3D topdown action adventure metroidvania.
  • Click or Press J to attack
  • Arrow keys or WASD to move
  • Space to jump

Made for Metroidvania Month Jam 8

Features:

  • 3 weapon upgrades
  • 3 animal spirit abilities
  • 3 Boss fights
  • 4 Unique Areas:
    • Whale Wreckage
    • Snake Sewers
    • Cardboard Keep
    • Birdseye Bluffs
